hello S=F8ren,

thanks for reporting this issue. i've opened a bug for the
=
Arc2Warc output. in general, ARC HTTP responses should be
written as WARC "=
response" records.

https://webarchive.jira.com/browse/HER-1748

a separate=
 issue should probably be opened against the Wayback
indexer with regard to=
 handling resource records (for those
records that may have been erroneousl=
y created due to the
Arc2Warc bug, and for those records that are correctly=

introduced in the future). i'll look into that as part of the
fix for HER-=
1748.

/steve@...

n wrote:
